title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.25 - Compliance with decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.25 - Compliance with decision

State Regulations
(a) When a decision directs the department to
perform specific actions, the department may comply as soon as practicable, but
not later than 90 days after receipt of the written decision. (b) The appellant for whose benefit any
direction was given must address any inquiry concerning department compliance
to the department's Bureau of Special Hearings which will assure compliance
with such direction by any means as may be necessary and appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
